Description: CDW-Government LLC agreed to pay $5.66 million to resolve allegations that it submitted false claims in connection with a U.S. General Services Administration. CDW-G , a wholly-owned subsidiary of CDW Corporation and a reseller of information technology products, resolved allegations that, during the period 1999 to 2011, it improperly charged government purchasers for shipping, sold products to the United States that were manufactured in China and other countries that are prohibited by the Trade Agreements Act.

Info Source: from a spreadsheet posted on the FAA website at https://www.faa.gov/about/office_org/headquarters_offices/ash/ash_programs/hazmat/compliance_enforcement/
